001000_00001_00110_0000000000000000    //0:  start: addi $6, $1, 0
001100_01000_01000_0000000000000000    //1:  andi $8, $8, 0
001111_00000_00100_0111000000000000    //2:  lui $4, 28672
001111_00000_00101_0111111111111111    //3:  lui $5, 32767
001101_01000_01000_0000000000001011    //4:  ori $8, $8, 11

000100_00110_00001_1111111111111111    //5:  loop: beq $6, $1, loop
001000_00001_00110_0000000000000000    //6:  addi $6, $1, 0
000000_00000_00001_00111_00001_000000  //7:  sll $7, $1, 1
000000_01000_00111_00111_00000_100000  //8:  add $7, $8, $7
000000_00111_00000_00000_00000_001000  //9:  jr $7
000010_00000_00000_00000_00000_000101  //10: j loop

000010_00000_00000_00000_00000_000101  //12: j loop

000000_00000_00000_00010_00000_010010  //26: mflo $2
